action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you donâ€™t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_text.important_information: In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isn't accepting guests from certain countries on dates where such guidelines exist. In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary, and other relevant info on dates where such guidelines exist. In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. This property does not accommodate bachelor(ette) or similar parties.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 6 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 6 to 12 years is charged VND 50000  per night when using existing beds.
One child from 12 to 18 years is charged VND 70000  per night when using existing beds.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  at a location nearby (reservation is needed).
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
